1.0.name: wordpress/political-profiler-by-electnext
1.0.description:
Attention political writers! Elevate your content and differentiate yourself from your pundit peers with the ElectNext Political Profiler.

Add comprehensive, data-driven, non-partisan profiles on any U.S. politicians to your posts. ElectNext's political "baseball cards" display up-to-date campaign finance, legislative, and biographical information, which is pulled in real-time from our databases for display on your site. We actively maintain profiles for over 10,000 politicians at the federal, state, and local levels.

The ElectNext Political Profiler is currently being used by some of the top news publishers in the country, including The PBS NewsHour, Hearst, and The Philadelphia Inquirer.

After downloading the Political Profiler plugin, send an ema
